trends: There have been 185 other sightings in Denver
There were no other sightings in Denver on or around May 5th 2011
Summary: thought i saw a falling star yet it disappeared whit large light still, then i law kept looking where it disappeared and it looked like a foggy mass the size of 2 blimps side by side then i turned to walk home and saw triangle aircraft no noise!
divs: Sighting DetailsI was walking dogs home heading north. i seen a bright star fall. yet i kept watching where it dissapeared at because it didnt look right, no fading or shrinking. what i then saw on same spot it dissapeared i made out a gray ghost like mass that it seemed to go behind it when it dissapeared. I looked for about 2min and then started walking saw to the west of me about a quarter mile to west a low flying aircraft with lights on the under belly 4 to six lights in a row i didnt count them not sure. The craft was only seemed 200ft above me. It was trangle and made no noise. it was passing me heading north east and a male jogger was then passing me i told him look up he did he said wow and kept jogging.the object elevated and went staight to same northern spot and dissapeared as well!
